title: Ritenow
lyrics:
Nah nah, nah nah
Girl don't give my love away, don't give my love away
Please don't do it, yeah
Girl please don't give my love away
Right now
Right now

Right now, right now



I'll run up in a nigga's shit right now (hell yeah)

I'll shoot a nigga up, the way I'm feeling right now, right now

So don't give in, no no, don't give in, no no (no no no)



Girl why the hell you runnin' off tellin' with my pussy?

It ain't my place to even ask but who the hell you screwin'?

And if the nigga in the city I'ma fuckin' lose it

I ain't no killer girl but please don't make me fuckin' do it

'Cause I be thinkin' too much when I'm in the sky

Is she really getting fucked by another guy?

Yeah we broke up but that body's still mines



Was together five years, that's a long time, long time, oh my

This grind got us segregated like old times

If I wasn't doing music we would be fine

'Cause every time we combine at the waistline

It feels good, don't it?



So don't give in, no no, 'cause these niggas don't know

How far this shit goes, yeah yeah yeah



Tell me why these pussy niggas really try me

They dap me up and show me love but they don't fuck with me

You're sweet as fuck and on your shit, that's why they want a piece

They see me put in work with you and now they want a piece

So don't waste your time, baby hold on

Don't do me that, don't do me wrong

It's that down south love we was built on

So it's fuck these niggas, don't fuck with these niggas



'Cause you mines but you not mines

And I be doing my thing and I can't lie

If I wasn't doing music we would be fine

'Cause every time we combine at the waistlane

It feels good, don't it?



So don't give in, no no, 'cause these niggas don't know

How far this shit goes, yeah yeah yeah

Tell me why these pussy niggas really try me

They dap me up and show me love but they don't fuck with me

'Cause these niggas don't know

How far this shit goes



Yeah yeah, yeah yeah yeah

Yeah, nah nah nah nah

These niggas don't know, they don't know, they don't know

How far this shit goes
